name: Widgetscripts
body:
# WidgetScripts 

App for running shell scripts via widgets. Was created as a replacement for existing app [GScript](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=nl.rogro.GScriptLite), that does not work consistently on android 4+.

[Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B4FpieTyT6oKY25tWEVid2gyemc/edit?usp=sharing)

# Screenshots

![](http://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=0B4FpieTyT6oKQXJzSE90ZFRKZzg)![](http://drive.google.com/uc?export=view&id=0B4FpieTyT6oKN09sZnhKMllOd28)

# WARNING!

Running scripts without knowing what you are doing, can damage the device!
Please use this program very carefully. 
The developer is not responsible for damaged product due to the use of this program.
To run the scripts as root, your device should be rooted.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
